entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.5°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Rain showers or wet flurries changing to flurries at times heavy this evening then to light snow overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm except 2 cm in areas east of Red Deer. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
